roleset.name: make sounds like a clock

example.name: metaphorical
example.text: Some litigators scoff at the notion that a sociologist knows more than they do about what makes a jury tick.

roleset.note: TICK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'tick' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry sound_emission-43.2. (from tick.01-v)

roleset.name: move position on a scale

example.name: use arg-m for the direction of decline
example.text: [The Red River] is now at 39 feet and [*]ticking down to a half foot below 1997 crest
example.arg: to a half foot below 1997 crest

example.name: most common args
example.text: US jobless claims tick down to 2008 levels.

roleset.note: TICK-V NOTES: Based on sentences in Fargo flood Twitter data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from tick.04-v)
Use DIR for the direction of decline (from tick.04-v)

roleset.name: mark (with a tick mark)

example.name: Both args + GOL
example.text: I do n't think either the US or the Soviet Union tick the boxes for me .
example.arg: the US or the Soviet Union

example.name: Both args
example.text: In the constraint dialogue box you have ticked the box with an image of a ruler next to it.
example.arg: the box with an image of a ruler next to it.

roleset.note: TICK-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from tick.05-v)

example.name: sentential arg0
example.text: Mr. Agnos complained that he was ``ticked [*]off'' that Vice President Dan Quayle, who toured the earthquake site Wednesday, didn't schedule a private meeting with him.
example.arg: that Vice President Dan Quayle, who toured the earthquake site Wednesday, didn't schedule a private meeting with him.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG0
example.text: Mr. Agnos complained that he was `` ticked off '' that Vice President Dan Quayle , who toured the earthquake site Wednesday , did n't schedule a private meeting with him .
example.arg: that Vice President Dan Quayle , who toured the earthquake site Wednesday , did n't schedule a private meeting with him

example.name: one two three...
example.text: He ticks off several major differences between now and two years ago.
example.arg: several major differences between now and two years ago.
